name: Hosus
description:
Hosus is an action-packed arcade game with a view from above, where the player plays for the Earth, which is protected from endless hordes of aliens named Hosus. The player must shoot back waves of advancing alien forces using various weapons and combat tactics.

During the game, the player will use various types of weapons such as shot guns, machine gun  to destroy alien enemies. He can also collect resources and upgrade his weapons to become even more effective in battle. The player will have to make tactical decisions, dodging shots and using cover to avoid danger.

The battle for Earth will continue

Controls:

For PC

– "←" for player go left

– "→" for player go right

– "Space " to shoot the bullets

For Android

– Joystick to rotate left and right

– Tap to shoot
